name: Abyss Defenders
description:
A creature of the void is rapidly approaching the abyssal base. Take up the role of heroes and repel the mighty monster.

Recommended 4 players. Any less will make the game much more challenging, and there are currently only 5 playable heroes.

The instruction manual pdf and .pcio file for playingcards.io are the only download assets.

Playingcards.io link [https://playingcards.io/nsezvp]. (Link expires 1/1/21)
